Note: Introduction to dialogue in one MS of 160.
_description: Verse introduction to a dialogue between the Virgin and Christ — three long lines in one manuscript

BLHar331.Transcription:
o blessyd moder & maydyn þis es a wondyrfull
                    þyngþe angel behet þe þat criste schold be þi son
                    and duel with þeand now he takit to þe a nyw son & go fro
                    þe
